newsitem.title: FINLAND: Helsinki seen flat to higher after U.S. boost.
newsitem.headline: Helsinki seen flat to higher after U.S. boost.

text.p: Shares were seen opening flat to higher on Wednesday after U.S. stocks rose overnight and Nokia's ADR ended near its Helsinki close, brokers said.
"The good tone will continue today," one broker said, predicting the market would open sideways but then rise by about half a percent on the main indices.

Raisio was seen with further upside despite soaring 30 percent on Tuesday on news it had found a U.S. partner to market its cholesterol-cutting Benecol: "It's not over yet," one broker said, but declined to predict how much further Raisio could go.
Merita and other financials were also seen continuing firm.
